General.Name: BJ's Restaurants Inc
General.Description: BJ's Restaurants, Inc. owns and operates casual dining restaurants in the United States. The company's restaurants offer pizzas, craft and other beers, appetizers, entrées, pastas, sandwiches, specialty salads, and desserts. BJ's Restaurants, Inc. was founded in 1978 and is based in Huntington Beach, California.
General.Address: 7755 Center Avenue, Huntington Beach, CA, United States, 92647
